meanings.definition: The quality or state of being satisfactory.
meanings.sent1: The satisfactorinesses of the meal were evident in the smiles on everyone's faces.
meanings.sent2: She always strives for satisfactorinesses in her work to ensure customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent3: The cat's level of satisfactorinesses in catching mice is truly impressive.
meanings.sent4: The satisfactorinesses of the team's performance shone brightly during the championship game.
meanings.sent5: The satisfactorinesses of the solution to the puzzle brought a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: The condition of being acceptable or adequate.
meanings.sent1: The satisfactorinesses of the repair work were questioned by the homeowner.
meanings.sent2: His speech lacked the satisfactorinesses needed to convince the audience.
meanings.sent3: The satisfactorinesses of the excuse given for being late was met with skepticism.
meanings.sent4: The satisfactorinesses of the makeshift bridge was put to the test during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The satisfactorinesses of the new policy was debated among the employees.
